buildCommand: export CARGO_HOME=/tmp/.cargo && export RUSTUP_HOME=/tmp/.rustup && export PATH="/tmp/.cargo/bin:$PATH" && curl https://sh.rustup.rs -sSf | sh -s -- -y --no-modify-path && rustup target add wasm32-unknown-unknown && cargo install wasm-pack && wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir www/pkg --release
